head.title: Arcstratus
head.description: Professional technology solution provider offering digital transformation consulting, custom software development, cloud solutions, intelligent analytics, and cybersecurity planning. We're passionate about creating tailored tech solutions, partnering with you to bring innovative ideas to life! From digital transformation to data analytics, we comprehensively meet enterprise technology needs to help your business grow.

hero.title: Arcstratus
hero.slogan: We are passionate about crafting customized solutions, collaborating hand-in-hand with various industries to realize dreams through innovative ideas!

service.title: Custom Software Development
service.description: Tired of off-the-shelf systems that don't quite fit? We'll build a tailor-made solution from scratch, perfectly suited to your unique needs. Your challenges are what drive us!

service.title: Cloud Solutions
service.description: Data at your fingertips, anytime, anywhere! Move to the cloud effortlessly, save on hardware costs, and scale resources as you please. Unleashing tech potential has never been this easy.

service.title: Digital Transformation Consulting
service.description: Done with outdated systems? We'll guide you through a complete overhaul! Discover tech tools that'll wow your team and step into the digital age with ease.

contact.content: Is your old system holding you back? Tired of making do with outdated systems? Don't worry, we'll accompany you through a major transformation. Click once, and let your team embrace a new digital future.

news.title: Latest News
news.description: Read about our latest product and announcements.

data.title: Company Launched
data.description: With big dreams and bold ambitions, we officially kicked off the company! This was the start of our journey to chase greatness!

unitobuy.title: UniToBuy
unitobuy.label: unitobuy.com
unitobuy.description: "BuyForYou" - your family's shopping assistant. Upload photos, sync lists, and turn any panicked parent into a shopping champion instantly.

comingSoon.description: We are discussing new product projects with our next partner

saveFiles.name: Save your files
saveFiles.description: We automatically save your files as you type.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: Use the calendar to filter your files by date.

hero.title: Commit to New Beginnings, Clarify the Cloud
hero.subtitle: Your Cloud Technology Partner
hero.description: Arcstratus Co., Ltd. is dedicated to cloud technology innovation, providing efficient software solutions, outsourcing services, and professional educational content.

about.title: About Arcstratus
about.description: Learn about our company's story, mission, values, and team.
about.storyContent: Founded with a vision to transform the digital landscape, Arcstratus has been at the forefront of technological innovation. Our journey began with a simple yet powerful mission: to help businesses thrive in the digital age through cutting-edge solutions and expert guidance.
about.missionContent: We are committed to empowering businesses with innovative technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage. Our mission is to be your trusted partner in digital transformation, helping you navigate the complex world of technology with confidence.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We maintain the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all our business dealings.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and work closely with our clients to achieve shared success.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for perfection in everything we do, ensuring the highest quality in our services.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly push boundaries and explore new possibilities to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

about.teamContent: Our team consists of passionate professionals with diverse expertise in software development, cloud computing, data analytics, and cybersecurity. Together, we bring years of experience and a shared commitment to excellence.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Comprehensive cloud services including infrastructure setup, application development, and system integration.

outsourcing.title: Technical Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Professional technical team providing complete development and maintenance services for your projects.

education.title: Professional Training
education.description: Cloud technology training courses and technical sharing to help teams enhance their capabilities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Let's discuss your needs and provide the most suitable solutions for you.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: Explore career opportunities at Arcstratus and be part of our innovative team.
careers.whyJoinContent: At Arcstratus, we believe in creating an environment where innovation thrives and talent grows. Join us to be part of a team that's shaping the future of technology.

benefits.title: Competitive Compensation
benefits.description: We offer competitive salaries and comprehensive benefits packages to ensure our team members are well taken care of.

benefits.title: Work-Life Balance
benefits.description: We understand the importance of maintaining a healthy balance between work and personal life.

benefits.title: Professional Growth
benefits.description: Continuous learning and development opportunities to help you grow in your career.

benefits.title: Innovative Environment
benefits.description: Work with cutting-edge technologies and be part of exciting projects that make a difference.

careers.cultureContent: Our culture is built on collaboration, innovation, and a shared passion for technology. We value diversity, creativity, and the unique perspectives each team member brings.

culturePillars.title: Collaboration
culturePillars.description: We believe in working together to achieve common goals and create innovative solutions.

culturePillars.title: Innovation
culturePillars.description: We encourage creative thinking and new ideas to drive technological advancement.

culturePillars.title: Growth
culturePillars.description: We support continuous learning and personal development for all team members.

careers.growthContent: At Arcstratus, we're committed to helping our team members grow both professionally and personally. We provide various opportunities for skill development and career advancement.

growthOpportunities.title: Technical Training
growthOpportunities.description: Regular workshops and training sessions to keep your skills up-to-date with the latest technologies.

growthOpportunities.title: Career Development
growthOpportunities.description: Clear career paths and mentorship programs to help you achieve your professional goals.

cta.title: Ready to Join Us?
cta.content: We're always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Send us your resume and let's explore opportunities together.
